description: A response from the NATS Micro $SRV.STATS API
title: io.nats.micro.v1.stats_response

name.description: The kind of the service. Shared by all the services that have the same name

id.description: A unique ID for this instance of a service

started.description: The time the service was stated in RFC3339 format
started.$comment: A point in time in RFC3339 format including timezone, though typically in UTC

items.description: Statistics about a specific service endpoint

subject.description: The subject the endpoint listens on

num_requests.description: The number of requests this endpoint received
num_requests.$comment: integer with a dynamic bit size depending on the platform the cluster runs on, can be up to 64bit

num_errors.description: The number of errors this endpoint encountered
num_errors.$comment: integer with a dynamic bit size depending on the platform the cluster runs on, can be up to 64bit

last_error.description: The last error the service encountered

processing_time.description: How long, in total, was spent processing requests in the handler
processing_time.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

average_processing_time.description: The average time spent processing requests
average_processing_time.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

queue_group.description: The queue group this endpoint listens on for requests

data.description: Additional statistics the endpoint makes available
